alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 03 at 12:29PM CST until March 03 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST /5 PM EST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 to 65 mph. * WHERE...In Illinois, Livingston, Iroquois and Ford Counties. In Indiana, Benton County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CST /5 PM EST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will lead to scattered damage, including blown down tree limbs and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be hazardous for high profile vehicles, especially on west to east roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If this overlaps with snow, visibility will sharply drop as well, potentially to one quarter mile or less.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
